授業目的: The purpose of this course is to equip students with the ability to start and finish an academic essay.
到達目標:
Students will be able to identify a research topic.
Students will be able to undertake a research agenda.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
One-to-one/student-teacher.
Each student will mostly work by themselves with the teacher helping on a one-to-one basis. Students will get a lot of time with the teacher.

第1回:
All 28 sessions are conducted face-to-face.
Course overview and expectations.
Introductions.
Students will work on their essay throughout the semester.
第2回: How to choose a good topic.
第7回: Plagiarism, and how to avoid it.
第8回: How to use Japanese in an English essay.
